sigmanauts.name: Chris Mattox
sigmanauts.shoutout: Thank you to everyone in Sigma! My cohort members continue to be a wonderful resource to learn from, as well as inspiring me to continue growing my skillz as a budding developer. Also, the instructors, I guess :/ Luke is cool, but I don't know about that Kris guy...

sigmanauts.name: Isaac Halvorson
sigmanauts.shoutout: I'd like to shout out to my wife for being supportive of her husband even while his attention and time is so focused on school.

sigmanauts.name: Liz Swabey-Keith
sigmanauts.shoutout: Huge thank you to everyone in my Sigma Cohort for getting me through this week!

sigmanauts.name: Luke Schlangen
sigmanauts.shoutout: Isaac! For showing me that creating an id creates a global javascript variable. Crazy! I was so excited that I made a JSFiddle about it! Fiddle

sigmanauts.name: Jason
sigmanauts.shoutout: Mad props to Emily for making our fruit stand look great!!

sigmanauts.name: Steve Larsen
sigmanauts.shoutout: Thanks to instructors, staff, pod-mates, teammates, and the entire Sigma cohort!  I am impressed with the group on a daily basis and can't imagine going through this journey with anyone else.

sigmanauts.name: Jake Iwen
sigmanauts.shoutout: Thank you to Fred for being such a positive energy force!

sigmanauts.name: Emily Keenan
sigmanauts.shoutout: Shout out to Isaac for always trying to take it to the next level!

sigmanauts.name: Oliver Alexander
sigmanauts.shoutout: Thanks to everyone for their fear speeches!

sigmanauts.name: Casey Hyde
sigmanauts.shoutout: Big ups to the dog. He ate a bite of my pizza during our in-person live chat, but we have since made amends. I thought he was very mature about the whole experience.

sigmanauts.name: Alex Hermundson
sigmanauts.shoutout: Thanks fellow Sigmanauts for being the best cohort in the building.

sigmanauts.name: Andrew Froiland
sigmanauts.shoutout: Thanks to all my classmates and instructors for, you know, just generally being cool people.

sigmanauts.name: Andy
sigmanauts.shoutout: Hien, thanks a ton for being so patient and helpful when you work with us.

sigmanauts.name: Kris Szafranski
sigmanauts.shoutout: Thank you to all of Sigma for being so attentive and keeping things fun! It's been an amazing first couple weeks!
